description:
Modifications to previous planning permission (Re.: 97/0105) to retain and modify (not demolish) existing vacant office buildings at 13-16 Britton Street, providing 1051m2 floorspace for A1/A2/A3 or B1 uses together with 27 x one bedroom, 20 x two-bedroom and 6 x three bedroom residential units. 

 APPLICANTS' PLAN NOS.:  1279/-01D, 02E, 03C, 04E, 05C, 06D
decision_conditions:
CONDITION: The development hereby permitted shall be begun not later than the expiration of five years from the date of this permission. 

 REASON: To comply with the provisions of Section 91(1) of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990.
